module.name: High Availability Services
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. Enables High Availability Services for FreePBX
module.changelog: *12.0.2.1* Handle special chars in Fencing properly *12.0.2* Add IPMI Lanplus support *12.0.1.1* Support for FreePBX 12, and support for updated drbdadm *2.11.5* Complete standalone fixcluster application (installed in /usr/local/asterisk on both nodes), add some more checks/fixes. *2.11.4* #7861 and repair broken buttons on R-Series page *2.11.3* Better Cluster checks, and minor UI facelift. *2.11.2* Fix installation error of 'Never received trigger' *2.11.1.14* Add missing icons *2.11.1.13* Fix IPMI Authentication issue *2.11.1.12* Sales Cleanup *2.11.1.11* Fix /var/run/asterisk errors. *2.11.1.8* Minor SSH verification fix. *2.11.1.7* Major Update, numerous bugfixes, support for iSymphony v3 *2.11.0.40* Add 'perform checks', better VMware fencing debug output. *2.11.0.38* Disk Size fixed *2.11.0.37* HP ILO Fix *2.11.0.36* Ensure local network CIDR is detected correctly *2.11.0.35* Fix for HTTPS and some BOND interfaces not being detected *2.11.0.34* Remove from beta and release as stable *2.11.0.31* Beta 2 Release *2.11.0.25* Beta 1 Release
